items.name: Black Pudding Nachos
items.description: Classic pub chips with black pudding, gravy, cheese, jalapenos, sour cream and salsa.

items.name: Chiles en Escocia
items.description: Poblano peppers prepared like Chiles en Nogada with a walnut cream sauce, but stuffed with haggis.  (Vegetarian option available)

items.name: Mars Bars stuffed Sopapillas
items.description: Ever had the Scottish classic deep fried Mars Bar? Instead of chippy batter we fry it in our fluffy Sopapilla dough.
